name: Throbbing Semi-SMOL Avery Famous Likeness
description: Tried to the best of my ability to reproduce the likeness of Avery Famous, instigator of the SMOL NFT revolution that is taking planet Earth by storm continually since early June 2021. As this file is of variable resolution, it only qualifies as a legitimate authorized SMOL piece during half of its 16 frames of animation, constituting thus a fork of the main movement, a schism which if not handled with consideration could lead to unforeseeable consequences.
